p:
The endophytic fungus was isolated from the freshly collected seed samples of Moringa oleifera Lam plant from the botanical garden of Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar India. The samples were processed as discussed earlier
15 . Pure culture was maintained at 4 °C in mineral oil. The molecular identification of the isolate (DSE 72) was done by National Fungal Culture Collection of India (NFCCI), Agharkar Research Institute, Pune, India.
